category.name: ProductView
category.category_description: Preferences affecting the behavior of Product views

preference.name: Vis_PV_LateLoadSaveOp
preference.preference_description: Specifies how late loaded ProductViews are to be handled during a save operation. Valid Values: * Ask - The user is prompted for their desired handling of late loaded ProductViews during save operation. * Ignore - All late loaded ProductViews are ignored for the save operation. * Abort - The save operation is aborted if any late loaded ProductView is present. * LoadAll - All late loaded ProductViews are loaded and included in the save operation. This is the default value.
